thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 19 of 218
thread.title: Aaron G.

author: Aaron G.
title: Aaron G.
text: I called intoxalock about six months before I was actually going to need anything installed. Once I did call back my agent, Matt had everything saved. I was given discounts based on my situation, one being from a referral. My agent has always followed up, been punctual, courteous and on point. The product is easy to use and straight forward. The installation was quick and clean. I'm very pleased with the quality of service and reliability of the product.
